class.name: HMACContext
class.brief_description: Used to create an HMAC for a message using a key.

method.name: finish
method.description: Returns the resulting HMAC. If the HMAC failed, an empty [PoolByteArray] is returned.

method.name: start
method.description: Initializes the HMACContext. This method cannot be called again on the same HMACContext until [method finish] has been called.

method.name: update
method.description: Updates the message to be HMACed. This can be called multiple times before [method finish] is called to append [code]data[/code] to the message, but cannot be called until [method start] has been called.
